title: How to Use Plastic Wrap Over a Grater to Grate Ginger
description: Ginger can be tricky to grate but we've got a tip that will get the job done easily and makes clean-up super quick! Wrap your grater with plastic wrap, then grate your fresh ginger on the wrapped surface. Collecting the grated ginger and cleaning up after

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText:
Ginger can be tricky to grate but we've got a tip that will get the job done easily and makes clean-up super quick! Wrap your grater with plastic wrap, then grate your fresh ginger on the wrapped surface. Collecting the grated ginger and cleaning up afterwards are both a breeze - just remove the plastic wrap and you're done!﻿

Have any good tips? Share them with us on Twitter and Instagram using the hashtag #OXOGoodTips.
